Parameters: int: event number for this notification
onGpsStatusChanged(int).Description: Called to report changes in the GPS status. The event number is one of: @B_android#location#GpsStatus#GPS_EVENT_STARTED_E@ @B_android#location#GpsStatus#GPS_EVENT_STOPPED_E@ @B_android#location#GpsStatus#GPS_EVENT_FIRST_FIX_E@ @B_android#location#GpsStatus#GPS_EVENT_SATELLITE_STATUS_E@ When this method is called, the client should call @B_android#location#LocationManager#getGpsStatus_E@ to get additional status information.
onGpsStatusChanged(int).history: Added in API level 3 Deprecated in API level 24

ClassDesc: use @B_android#location#GnssStatus#Callback_E@ instead. Used for receiving notifications when GPS status has changed.
